articles.title: India suspends international flights until 31 March - Times of Oman
articles.description: The move is in keeping with stopping the spread of the COVID-19 pandemic in the country
articles.content:
New Delhi: Flights to India that lie outside its air bubble agreements with other countries have been suspended until 31 March, 2021, the countrys Director of Civil Aviation has announced.
